code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

tr.td: ALP=220 U/L,AST=25 U/L,ALT=25 U/L,Total Bilirubin=3.5 mg/dL

td.content: s:patient presents with mild vomiting, severe pain all over the abdomen. pt also reports of mild recurrent epigastric pain. patient is a 49 yo F. o:Height 166 cm, Weight 43.5 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 15 a:Pancreatic Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed FLUOROURACIL - 500 mg IV, mitomycin - 10 mg/m2 IV, and ordered Comprehensive Metabolic Panel, Amylase, Lipase, CA 19-9.

Value.Value: ordered Comprehensive Metabolic Panel , Amylase , Lipase , CA 19 - 9
